Flower.Name: Flower
Flower.FlavorText: Something to give to a loved one when you get back home, either in their hand or on their grave

Thingy.Name: Thingy
Thingy.FlavorText: A strange object, who knows what it does

Trinketo.Name: Trinketo
Trinketo.FlavorText: It fills you with power, but of what kind?
